definition.text: To place a plugin in a workspace you must select the option to add the missing plugins on the node of the matching type!

paragraphs.text: Let's give it a shot! Select Add Missing Trading Systems in the Plugin Trading Systems node! Confirm with a second click...

That's it! The rest of the plugins available in the Trading-Systems folder are added as Plugin File nodes! You may delete the Plugin File nodes of the trading systems you don't need and keep the ones you need!
Now you may use the Plugin File Position node to place the plugin in the desired position!
